io.micronaut.test.annotation

Annotation Type MockBean


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE,ANNOTATION_TYPE,FIELD})
 @Bean
 @Requires(condition=TestActiveCondition.class)
 @Refreshable(value="micronaut.test.spock.active.mocks")
 @Around(proxyTargetMode=ALLOW)
public @interface MockBean
    Annotation that can be applied on the method level in a test to define a Mock bean using Spock's mocking API.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> bean 
      java.lang.String named
      The name of the bean to replace in the case of multiple beans.
      java.lang.Class<?> value 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        @AliasFor(annotation=io.micronaut.context.annotation.Replaces.class,
          member="value")
public abstract java.lang.Class<?> value
        Returns:
        The bean this mock replaces
        Default:
        void.class

      • bean

        @AliasFor(annotation=io.micronaut.context.annotation.Replaces.class,
          member="value")
public abstract java.lang.Class<?> bean
        Returns:
        The bean this mock replaces
        Default:
        void.class

      • named

        @AliasFor(annotation=io.micronaut.context.annotation.Replaces.class,
          member="named")
public abstract java.lang.String named
        The name of the bean to replace in the case of multiple beans.
        Returns:
        The qualifier
        Default:
        ""
